sections.heading: Bed and breakfast establishments which serve breakfast shall
sections.text: comply with the following minimum standards:

sections.heading: Each person who is provided accommodations shall be provided
sections.text:
individual soap and clean individual bath cloths and towels. Clean bed
linen in good repair shall be provided for each guest who is provided
accommodations and shall be changed between guests and as often as
necessary. Clean linen shall be stored and handled in a sanitary manner.

sections.heading: Bed and breakfast establishments shall meet the State Fire
sections.text:
Marshal's requirements for one and two-family dwellings. In addition, the
following standards shall be required:

sections.heading: The bed and breakfast establishment shall provide proof of
sections.text: adequate liability insurance as required by the licensing agency.

sections.heading: The bed and breakfast establishment shall fulfill the
sections.text:
requirements of the Illinois Department of Revenue, including the payment
of any applicable hotel taxes.
